Activity: Arrive at the office, grab coffee. Check emails and review the week's progress.
Choose one character sketch, one environment concept, and one prop design to polish and finalize. Focus on adding details and creating a high-quality presentation.
Work on the character sketch. Refine the anatomy, add details to the clothing and equipment, and create a dynamic pose.
Take a break to stretch and clear my head. Maybe browse some online art forums for inspiration.
Work on the environment concept. Add details to the background, create a sense of depth, and refine the lighting.
Work on the prop design. Add details, refine the texture, and ensure it fits seamlessly into the game's environment.
Prepare a presentation of the finalized character sketch, environment concept, and prop design to share with the team.
Send an email to the whole team to show the whole concept art. TOPIC: Weekly Concept Art Presentation.
Wrap up for the day. Save all files and back up my work. Leave for the weekend.
